properties.name: 14 Fossa Avenue Waterfront
properties.description: Posted by Rudymayer 14 Fossa Avenue, Nashua NHWow! Peaceful waterfront vacation getaway or convenient city home? Have BOTH with this completely redone home near historic downtown Nashua. The home is located in a quiet setting at the end of a cul-de-sac, just minutes from Route 3 - an easy commute to Boston. Featuring three large bedrooms, central air conditioning, and a sun-drenched sunroom and elevated deck overlooking the lush landscaping and the beautiful Salmon Brook waterfront backyard.

properties.name: 3 Nancy Court Single family + in-law
properties.description: Posted by Rudymayer  3 Nancy Court, Nashua NHThis completely remodeled home features a main home as well as a downstairs in-law apartment, situated on a 16,301 square foot, manicured lot on a quiet street in a family oriented neighborhood. The backyard is spacious, with a lush green lawn surrounded by trees and woods.

properties.name: 31 Allds Street, Nashua NH 2 Family + Barbershop
properties.description: Posted by Rudymayer   31 Allds Street, Nashua NHrown Hill 2 family plus barber shop. Offering a one bedroom, a four bedroom, plus a two chair barber shop. This home is in good condition with lots of exposure & great back yard. Tenants are "at will!" Barber shop has lease until 11-07.

properties.name: 310-32 Brook Village Road, Nashua NH Condo
properties.description: Posted by Rudymayer 310-32 Brook Village Road, Nashua NHConvenient exit 1 South Nashua Condo. Good sized two bedroom garden style unit at Border Brook Terrace in Bicentennial School District. Fully applianced eat in kitchen, deck. Condo fee includes heat, hot water and cooking gas. Laundry facilities on site. Attic with storage space. Elevator building. Great, easy commute to Boston.

properties.name: 38 Quail Run Drive Detached Condo
properties.description: Posted by Rudymayer 38 Quail Run Drive, Hudson NHThis 16 year old Compass Point condominium is located on a dead end street in Hudson, New Hampshire, literally minutes away from two major grocery stores, shopping and restaurants, as well as convenient, close access to Rt 3 (to Boston MA or Manchester NH).

properties.name: 41 Jambard Road, Hollis NH Colonial
properties.description: Posted by Rudymayer 41 Jambard Road, Hollis NHThis beautiful contemporary Colonial is located in the best location in Hollis, at the very end of a long, private cul-de-sac. Surrounded by lush trees and foliage, this home is the ultimate in privacy with virtually no traffic - a perfect home for a family with children! The abundance of space offers many rooms to suit your every desire - from the soaring two story foyer, to the office or the sun filled media room, featuring a hard-wired surround-sound system.

properties.name: 63 Rangers Drive, Hudson NH Colonial/ Gambrel
properties.description: Posted by Rudymayer 63 Rangers Drive, Hudson NHTerrific Hudson Colonial/Gambrel offering 3,204 square feet, four good-sized bedrooms, master bedroom with private bath, fireplace and finished lower level. Private and fenced .7 acre lot with a shed & pool, public water & sewer. Great commuter location near Rte. 111 to Rt 93 South/Boston.

properties.name: 66 Bluestone Drive, Nashua NH Condo
properties.description: Posted by Rudymayer 66 Bluestone Drive, Nashua NHVery nice and clean ground floor unit offers one large bedroom with walk-in closet, extra large living room with slider to patio. Nice kitchen with laundry hookups, dining area & low condo fee of 35/mo., tennis court, detached garage. Great Exit 1 & 2 location. Hurry!

properties.name: 9 Trocha, Nashua NH Detached Condominium
properties.description: Posted by Rudymayer 9 Trocha, Nashua NHNice 1,800 square foot unit at the popular "Country Hill". Fireplaced living room, three goodsized bedrooms, finished lower level, new heating system, central air conditioning, security system, pantry, tile, updated appliances, washer, dryer and refrigerator included, tennis courts, pool.
